sub_title: Development Manager at Christian International School of Prague
summary:
I am someone who loves to see people and organizations thrive. Having enabled this in various roles over the past years has been great and it is something I want to continue doing for as long as I am on this planet.

In the role of BI Consultant at Kampano s.r.o I was able to help companies to make sense of their data, creating dashboards that make sense. A data warehouse needs to be able to process it's data fast so I often looked at query performance and applied my knowledge of query tuning to see how a query can run faster. Sometimes it doesn't end there though and the issue can be in hardware or the virtualization environment. Through running traces on a database or on the OS itself these performance can be visualized and acted upon.

In the role of IT Manager for Christian International School of Prague I was able to implement many improvements to the IT landscape of the school. I have replaced old, end-of-life servers for a new server running VMware ESXi to enable rapid deployment of virtual servers. With the new server the Panasonic VoIP system could be replaced by FreePBX saving on licensing costs. I have also moved the school to a business internet connection for additional reliability. Finally another big project I have done is consolidating all the network equipment to one vendor to be able to manage the infrastructure from a single Unifi Controller.

In my current role as Development Manager at Christian International School of Prague I have been able to set up a development department. Through talking to our staff I am able to identify fundraising needs. Using our school's events, regular newsletters and appeals to our community I have been able to raise funds for PE equipment, library books, fitness room mirrors and more. I have also successfully attracted major donors. Beside fundraising activities I am also responsible for a rebranding, a new website, alumni events and the parent teacher organization.
